name: SqlReportingServicesDeployment
description: Deploys the SQL reporting files to the SQL Reporting Service
author: Tobania
helpMarkDown: Deploys the SQL reporting files to the SQL Reporting Service

inputs.name: ReportFiles
inputs.label: Report files:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the rdl file(s). Can use Wildcards: $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/**/*.rdl

inputs.name: ReportUploadRootPath
inputs.label: Upload path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Upload (root) path to upload the RDL files to

inputs.name: IncludeDataSource
inputs.label: Include Data Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the Datasource of the Report

inputs.name: DataSourcePath
inputs.label: Datasource path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Path to the new datasource to use

inputs.name: WebserviceUrl
inputs.label: Webservice URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL to the SQL server reporting Webservice. (Example: http(s)://[ServernameFQDN]/ReportServer/ReportService2010.asmx?wsdl)

inputs.name: WsUsername
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username to connect with the Webservice

inputs.name: WsPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password to connect with the webservice. Use a new build variable with its lock enabled on the Variables tab to encrypt this value.

inputs.name: OverrideExisting
inputs.label: Override existing files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable or disable overriding of existing RDL files on the reporting server
